SKT_FIRST.name: Shoulder Tackle
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적 전체에게 피해를 입힙니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Sturdy Body
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) When hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to reduce the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Pressure Festival</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> and increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) When hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000051_2_1]</color> chance to reduce the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Pressure Festival</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000051_2_2] turn(s)</color> and increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000051_2_1]</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 피격 시 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>압박축제</color>의 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소하고, <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)ダメージを受けた場合、<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>【三散祭り】</color>のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少し、<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Pressure Festival
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Resilience</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000051_3_1]</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Resilience</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000051_3_1] turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>85%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 저항</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.\n이 스킬은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>85%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>効果抵抗</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\nこのスキルは自分の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>25</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt is proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers Action Points of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000051_chain_1_1]</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage dealt is proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color> 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> :자신의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>이 높을수록 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、自分のAPを<color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:自分の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
